char_info.desc: The Phantoms Who Leap Through Time

a0.speaker: Marisa:
a0.dialogue: Why are you here? You're supposed to be in... er...

a1.speaker: Marisa:
a1.dialogue: Well, I forgot. But I can hear the 'Hallelujah Chorus' from somewhere distant.

a3.speaker: Kagami:
a3.dialogue: Fancy meeting you here! You look a little older than the last time I saw you. Anyway...

a4.speaker: Yumi:
a4.dialogue: Sister! A huge laser, supposedly from that girl, fired at me earlier on!

a5.speaker: Marisa:
a5.dialogue: Oh, so both of you are approaching me for me to take down this creep? Well then, time for me to...

a7.speaker: Kagami:
a7.dialogue: They are acting like it is Christmas or Easter, blasting religious music 24/7, and worst of all hog my audiences!

a8.speaker: Yumi:
a8.dialogue: I am tired of listening to the concert blasting that Handel composition over and over!

a10.speaker: Marisa:
a10.dialogue: Oh yes... This is what I am waiting for!

a11.speaker: Kagami:
a11.dialogue: Good point that you are supporting bringing down the concert.

a12.speaker: Kagami:
a12.dialogue: Join me in the great raid plot, my Queen.

a13.speaker: Yumi:
a13.dialogue: But what about me? Are you braindead?

a14.speaker: Yumi:
a14.dialogue: Now, silly witch, if your laser can knock me down, my sheer powers are going to star KO you!!
